dialog: You almost lost me back there.
I found this on a family camping trip when I was a kid.
Well, if you really wanna go back to nature...
Promise we'll do this every year.
Thanks, Toni, having only known him since freshman year.
Still kind of cool, though, right?
Finding out you actually had some family out there.
And that's why my brother and those guys are right behind us.
Look, I don't know what to expect.
I don't know these people or this place.
I could be inheriting a Motel 6.
I'm just saying, it's the Appalachians.
If it'll help, I did some digging.
This isn't for one of your columns.
Hobb Springs, established 1926 by families unknown.
The first sanitarium in America outside Battle Creek.
I'll hold you to that, Mr. Jackson.
It's more like a health spa, really.
Spas don't come with their own outhouse, Bryan.
You know, getting Danny out in the open air, seeing how much of an inheritance this really is.
Really, Rod? Me fixing a tire is so amazing?
Just playing with my new camera.
And your old camera posted my naked ass all over the internet last trip!
And got 4,000 hits in one day.
And fun is just the kind of therapy we all need.
You've checked yourself  He'll be here real soon.
We play this right, sister, he won't be able to resist you.
Our little place in the country.
Couple coats of paint, and it could be...
Vic, get out of the car.
I need a moment alone with my boyfriend.
What do you want to do?
Just when I hit the lowest I've ever hit, I got a letter saying that I belonged to something.
Something that I gave up on years ago.
Tell me what you wanna do, honey.
I wanna meet these people and find out what I'm all about.
I could tell by your eyes.
I cannot believe that you are finally here.
We weren't expecting your friends, but, um...
...I'm pretty sure we can handle you, though.
Oh, we're just the first wave.
How are we even gonna find our way around in there?
Better leave a trail of breadcrumbs.
We got a flat,  and then got a little...
We have plenty of vacancies coming up.
Don't worry, they'll be checking out today and then we'll have the place  all to ourselves.
I'd be happy to show you around.
Uh, maybe we could get our bags first.
They're kind of goodlooking for hillbillies.
Come on, they're probably just a normal couple.
Actually, we're kissing cousins on our Quaker brother's sister's side.
I'm so sorry, that was so rude of us.
Ain't nothing we haven't heard before.
Just let it roll off my back nowadays.
So you really are brother and sister?
As I said, we weren't expecting so many.
We can make more, if you'd like.
Uh, no, no, it's fine. Really.
We'll leave you hereto rest a spell while we figure out how best to deal with you.
Ain't no doubt all of this is a little bit weird.
You guys don't get the charm of this place?
You rip the place down, subdivide the land, and we go back, we'll send someone in for a real appraisal.
Yeah, I think you're forgetting that I don't have anywhere to go.
What, so this is your home now?
Danny, you're used to Central Park West  and Nobu on Friday nights.
Yeah. And look what that did to me.
Hey, we don't have to make a decision right away. It's fine.
Enough excitement for two weeks at least.
Come on, back me up, Vic.
A place this old surely has a book in it.
Short of murder, or a Hollywood scandal, who'd give a shit?
Me, Bryan. We could be talking about my history.
Is that the big, strong man I rang for?
And tor those that don't watch Antique Roadshow...
Oh, and they look to be in perfect condition.
Oh, they're gonna be worth a fortune.
How'd you like my place now, Bryan?
This place just got a whole lot better.
Hey, guys, if we're gonna do this, we're gonna do this in style.
I'm still wrapping my head around that.
Maybe it's just what we needed.
I suppose this will have to do.
Afraid this is all we have right now.
Hello? We're the new owner's best friends. So you can do better.
Now, you boys had your fun with those bikers.
And you messed with the little bitty real nice.
Leave Danny alone. Even if it means giving his friends a pass.
Now I thought I made myself clear!
it won't be long, and you can all have at 'em as much as you like.
Now you keep doing what you're doing you're gonna ruin this for all of us!
So, like, what's the plan with the cameras, dude?
Like, you're carrying them around everywhere.
I think we should put one of these in Danny's room.
Oh, I'm not up for seeing my sister naked, but thank you, though.
Well, what about the rest of us, dude?
Please tell me you got a camera for this.
Give it here, give it here.
I'd like to thank the Academy for this prestigious award.
I will enjoy this every single day.
Tell me how it's fair that we have to pay for groceries.
No, we're staying up at Hobb Springs.
I don't get up there much myself anymore, but I expect I will be.
You all see a bunch of little, old ladies bebopping around up there?
That'd be them. Poor things can't remember if this woman got back on that bus or not.
Agnes Fields, you hear of her?
No. Like I said, we just got here, so...
Just what is a lovely couple like you doing settling in Hobb Springs?
Oh, well, our friend inherited it.
You take one of these up there, do me a favor, show it around.
Maybe we get lucky and her face will ring a bell with somebody.
I can't think what could have happened to her.
I can't get this hot spot to work.
Yeah, he just wandered through here a minute ago.
Leave him alone, Mom, he's enjoying himself.
Come on. Let's go find him.
I guess this place just gives me the creeps.
Danny. We've been looking all over for you.
Take a look at this picture and tell me if I should be.
That guy kind of looks like Danny.
Even some of the women do.
The whole history of this hotel's up here.
How could I not know any of these people?
These pictures only go up to the '70s.
Maybe your side of the family moved.
I think we just met your cousins.
Whoa, you guys Why the hell are they all covered up?
I don't know how to break this to you, man, but what we have here is classic mountain breeding.
I'm just saying, there's bound to be a few defects along the way.
You think 'cause we're mountain folk, our ways ain't fit for fine society?
We've had all sorts stay here, including three presidents: Teddy Roosevelt, Calvin Coolidge, and Jefferson Davis.
I'm just very proud of my heritage.
Families really tamed this land, they made it into something.
You have a good eye, Danny.
He was hell with a bow.
I would like to keep it that way.
That's hardly a proper view, miss, considering you haven't even tried it once.
Your girl, she really didn't want you to come.
That guy with the fancy car and girl to match.
Bryan? We used to work together, before it all... happened.
I used to be on Wall Street.
Had a bit of a meltdown.
I lost a lot of people's money.
I guess that's when you find out who your real friends are.
The ones who stand by you.
Maybe they think you owe them.
You weren't suited to that nonsense.
On the plus side, it's how we found you.
We do have the internet out here.
So you found me through Google?
But it was important we found you.
Anything on this land belongs to us.
Oh, yeah. Remember the little gaggle of old ladies?
Well, one of them went AWOL.
You need to go get Danny.
It's gonna get dark soon, and I don't like him alone with these people.
Every man lives by his own set of rules.
Speaking of which, time to introduce you to the hunt.
First you gotta scout, then stretch.
Where men can't get to it.
Lure, entice the deer over your ways.
You don't wanna go after your prey.
You let your prey come to you.
And being smarter than the animal.
Now we check the blood trail.
Pink blood with air bubbles means you've hit the heart or the lung.
Dark red, you probably hit the liver.
The buck may hang in there, but they will die soon enough.
Watery blood with bile, you may have to track the deer, deliver another shot.
But if you've aimed just right, it'll be pure reflex.
We have more than enough meat back home.
We can't just leave it like this.
He may have some kick left in him.
Upper shoulder, neck or brain. Go.
Charlie, what did you do to this weed?
Most of it's not mine anyway. Ah!
We've gotta get out of here!
Or not. Here, pull from that end.
Pull from that. Slow, slow, slow!
I'm blaming Vic for that too.
You have to be sure about these woods.
So I heard a buck, your first time shooting.
It takes some getting used to.
No, no, it's... it's fine, actually.
I'm gonna wash this off of my hands.
Now to get you out of those bloody things.
All right, it's OK. I can do it.
Now, don't you be that way. I patched up all my brothers one time or another.
All you boys react that way.
You just have some aches that need rubbing out.
Toni will be here any second, so...
And it beats inside every one of us.
And with your mind, your schooling, your strength, and our blood, you can have anything you want.
I still find it hard to believe that.
Jackson brought Danny to me to tend to.
I got pretty messed up, hon.
Yeah, Vic didn't look so good either.
I should go tend to him.
Think she's gonna help Vic take off his clothes too?
She was just trying to help.
What is all over your legs?
I had a bad feeling about this.
You going Did you actually kill something?
Because it looks like you rolled around in blood.
Yeah, with a bow and arrow.
No, it's not. I'm not impressed.
What are you, a hunter now?
Oh, yeah, big time. Big man.
Get that thing out of my face.
Can I interest you in an herbal essence?
Keep that shit away from me too.
You see one mountain monster man, and you go cold turkey.
You know what I saw today?
There we go, there we go.
You see any mountain men now? Ahh!
Give us the old Girls Gone Wild.
Fuck you! I'd like to see you guys do Boys Gone Wild.
Wait a second. You're doing what?
Figure we could have a grand reopening by next summer.
What did you do to him last night?
Haven't you guys felt different since you got here?
No, we're really happy for you, hon.
Was great. And it can be again.
Do you even know anything about...
about running a hotel, or a spa?
I'm not just doing it for the money.
No, we get that. We really do.
Rod? You said that we'd all make a great web series.
What better way to film a group of friends restoring a great landmark.
Yeah. I could definitely cut a good sizzle reel together.
Make it a rustic Real World.
You said you were game for writing a book about the history of this place.
The rest of it is just simple business sense and that's why they paid us the big bucks.
Well, I guess it wouldn't hurt to draw up a business plan.
I know what you're gonna say.
Then why are you gonna make me say it?
Did you look at the guy?
We were supposed to be going back to the city.
It's not so easy for me to just pack it all in, you know.
I don't even know why we're still friends with the guy!
You just don't know when to shut up!
What exactly were you doing with that?
Do you have any idea how much these are worth?
I didn't think anyone would notice.
Where else have you checked for these?
Just here. I didn't wanna look alone.
All right. I'll bring them to you, and you catalogue them. OK?
So secret passages really do exist.
Yeah, but where do they lead?
They keep priceless antiques out in the open.
Can you imagine what they decided to hide?
You're saying that they would just have sex here  while people stood by and watched?
Geez. This is one kinky spa.
Wait. Are we really gonna do this?
You might as well take what you came for.
What those boys did to you...
But I've seen people live with a lot worse.
Just let Sally take care of you.
I think you like me rubbing up against you.
I can make you feel better than that stuckup bitch you brought.
You're supposed to be saving yourself for when the time's right.
I know it's hard to wait.
But I'm so close, that I can touch him.
How did this one get in here to begin with?
The fact they stopped at all is a small miracle.
We have them all meet Danny tonight.
You'll be in me, one way or another.
I'm gonna need some more paper.
This would go a hell of a lot faster if we knew what Danny had in mind.
We need keys to some of these places.
Only if Wednesday Adams is on a break.
I'll go, but you go get your boyfriend.
Toni! Hey, We could all use a little guidance out there, please.
Was she trying to take these?
She and Bry were always going on about selling things off.
When it comes to money, Bryan's done worse.
Looks like they took off with a few parting gifts.
Well, I guess you never really know anybody, huh?
We've known them for three years.
Yeah, all they've ever been about is the quick and easy.
Bryan with his subprimes, and Jillian playing the Manhattan socialite bitch.
I mean, I gave 'em a chance to get in on the ground floor.
God forbid they ever achieve anything in life by actually working for it.
That's what I'm trying to do here.
You know why Bryan's so eager to get me back in the firm?
So he didn't have to do any work.
I always did the heavy lifting, and look what that cost me.
This... this is my new one.
My God! I am really trying hard to be supportive right now, but the only person I don't feel like I know is you!
You wanted to bring me here.
Because I thought it was gonna help.
Even Sally noticed the difference  from when I got here.
You wanna bring up... No, no! No!
They are the only ones that we really know nothing about!
How do you not get that?
Have you checked into anything that they've told you?
They have been nothing but kind to me.
I need to talk to you.
There's so many things we need to explain, we're just not sure how.
I'm sure this is already so overwhelming for you.
And we're thrilled that you're  interested in the hotel.
But it's already just such a small aspect of who we really are.
I think it's better if we show you.
There's members of the family that have been aching to meet you.
Wouldn't it be easier to use a flashlight?
It's the way we do things.
They're all kin, One way or another.
Come to welcome you home, Danny.
How long have you been doing this?
We've known each other since our clans first set foot in these hills.
There were three families back in those days.
The Craytons, the Boggles and the Hillickers.
Reaped its rewards, the coal, the timber.
Others tried to chisel in on what we'd earned, but we had birthright.
That's for the lady. That's for you.
See, like this brew, Hobb Springs is a testament to family.
It's a place for our folk to gather from far and wide.
Like your friends came with you.
And they bring temptation to stray.
Weakened our family, muddied our blood.
See, how do you preserve family strength?
How do you keep it pure?
See, what was tradition became ritual.
And that ritual preserved our blood lines, it cleansed it even.
Our devotion was strong and rewarded, but when it was weak...
The ones that do, they don't survive.
And that's why we need you, Danny.
See, only true blood will keep this family alive.
No. You only think you do.
I don't know who you are.
I'll say, we almost killed you, man!
Danny! What the hell happened to you?
Us? We were scared out of a sound sleep by some maniac banging on the fucking door!
I don't need this right now, Rod. OK?
I don't know. You should know, huh?
Come on, get off. Come on.
Listen, we need to leave right now.
You know what? You guys can leave.
How the fuck should I know?
Why don't you just let me get some sleep, please.
Guys, I've never seen him this fucked up.
Should you guys carry him upstairs  or something?
We have to get Danny to go.
Whether he wants to or not.
Get Toni out of here right now!
No! We go and come back for help!
I think he knows what's been going on!
You saw when you asked about Vic.
No. Danny would never do that, Rod!
Listen to your brother for a change!
What did you do to him?
Did you do something to him?
He doesn't know what you are.
So you think you know all of our secrets now?
I'm gonna tell Danny everything about you.
To fill me with a baby.
And I can already feel that baby coming deep inside.
You're gonna get yours now, girl!
You wanna see what firewater does to that pretty face?!
What the hell are you doing?!
You're trying to kill my family now?
So just go before you get hurt!
You fucking hurt my sister. Huh?!
I'm afraid I can't do that, Danny.
You see, we have our ways.
Don't worry, baby, I'm gonna make this real quick.
I brought her here, and she's my responsibility.
Now you've gone and killed one of us.
He was trying to kill me.
You have a fantastic day, thank you.
Just you wait until you've experienced our hot springs.
Boy, are they to die for.
Now, go find your rooms, OK?
Don't go disappearing on us now, OK?
Come on, boys, we've got more important work to do, huh?
Come on. Let's go. Let's go.
